name: Doraemon: Nobita no Yousei no Kuni
name_original: Doraemon: Nobita no Yousei no Kuni
description:
Doraemon: Nobita no Yousei no Kuni is an adventure-platformer game developed by Sakata SAS. It came out on 19-02-1993. It was published by Epoch.
Doraemon: Nobita no Yousei no Kuni is available on SNES.
